title: Music Playlist
body:
Greetings Oceanic Board goers. I thought I would create a thread for music. A thread where you can get songs other people have suggested or you can suggest your own.

So here are some of my songs of choice for League.

Ronald Jenkees - Piano Wire
Lemaitre - Cut to Black
Carla Bruni - Quelqu'un m'a dit

replies.body:
This is my playlist, the goods~!
Chill music to keep you calm in the background of LoL playing
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLXstyhWCS9VlclMGDU826rLpukblFoCmf

^this
but if idc, pendulum, slay, wu-tang, dubstep

Honestly, I don't play music while playing League. It distracts me too much, because I'll be concentrating on tapping out the beat with my feet rather than on the game. I don't even have the in game music going, because I find it just makes me tense and I make more mistakes.

That's just me though :)
